components/product/quick-shop:
{{> components/product/product-gallery-slideshow}}
{{> components/product/product-single-details}}
components/product/product-gallery-slide:
{{#if product.images}} {{#each product.images}} {{/each}} {{else}} {{/if}}
{{#if product.images}} {{#each product.images}} {{/each}} {{else}} {{/if}}
components/product/product-single-detail:
{{#unless product.out_of_stock_message}} {{else}} {{/unless}} {{#if product.brand}} {{product.brand.name}} {{/if}}

{{product.title}}

{{#if product.call_for_price}} {{product.call_for_price}} {{/if}} {{#if product.price}} {{> core/products/price price=product.price show_savings=false price_range_display=theme_settings.price_range_display retail_price_label=theme_settings.retail-price-label non_sale_price_label=theme_settings.non-sale-price-label sale_price_label=theme_settings.sale-price-label price_label=theme_settings.price-label sale_badges=theme_settings.sale-badges }} {{/if}}
{{{region name="product_below_price"}}}
{{#if settings.show_product_rating}} {{> components/reviews/ratings rating=product.rating}} {{/if}} {{#if settings.show_product_reviews}} {{#if settings.show_product_rating}} ( {{ lang 'product.reviews.review_count' num_reviews=product.num_reviews }} ) {{else}} {{lang 'product.reviews.review_count_alt' num_reviews=product.num_reviews}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
{{#each product.reviews.messages}} {{#if error}} {{> core/alerts/alert-error message=error dismissable=false}} {{/if}} {{#if success}} {{> core/alerts/alert-success message=success dismissable=false}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{#if product.options}}
{{#each product.options}} {{{dynamicComponent 'core/forms/options'}}} {{/each}}
{{/if}} {{#if product.customizations}}
{{#each product.customizations}} {{{dynamicComponent 'core/forms/customizations'}}} {{/each}}
{{/if}} {{#if product.event_date}} {{> core/products/event}} {{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.show_product_quantity_box}}
{{/if}}
{{lang 'product.current_stock'}} {{#if product.stock_level}} {{product.stock_level}} {{else}} 0 {{/if}} {{#if product.out_of_stock}} {{#if product.out_of_stock_message}} {{product.out_of_stock_message}} {{else}} {{lang 'product.sold_out'}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
{{#if product.can_purchase}} {{else}} {{/if}}
{{lang 'product.view_product_details'}}
{{#if settings.show_wishlist}}
{{> components/wishlist/wishlist-modal}}
{{/if}} {{#if product.add_this.length}} {{> components/common/sharing-buttons sharing_title=product.title sharing_url=product.url sharing_image=product.main_image }} {{/if}}
{{#if product.description}}
{{{product.description}}}
{{/if}} {{#unless theme_settings.single-product-hide-details}} {{#or product.sku product.upc product.stock_level product.condition product.availability product.release_date product.weight product.gift_wrapping_available product.shipping product.custom_fields }}
{{lang 'product.additional_info'}}
{{> components/product/additional-info}}
{{/or}} {{/unless}} {{#if product.warranty}}
{{lang 'product.warranty'}}
{{product.warranty}}
{{/if}} {{#if product.bulk_discount_rates.length}}
{{lang 'product.bulk_pricing.title'}}
{{#each product.bulk_discount_rates}}

{{lang 'product.bulk_pricing.range' min=min max=max}} {{#if type '===' 'percent'}} {{{lang 'product.bulk_pricing.percent' discount=discount.formatted}}} {{/if}} {{#if type '===' 'fixed'}} {{{lang 'product.bulk_pricing.fixed' discount=discount.formatted}}} {{/if}} {{#if type '===' 'price'}} {{{lang 'product.bulk_pricing.price' discount=discount.formatted}}} {{/if}}

{{/each}}
{{/if}} {{> components/reviews/review-modal}}
core/alerts/alert-success:
{{#if dismissable}}×{{/if}}
{{#if message}} {{{message}}} {{else}} {{{this}}} {{/if}}
components/reviews/ratings: {{#for 1 5}} {{#if ../this.rating '>=' $index}} {{else}} {{/if}} {{/for}}
core/alerts/alert-error:
{{#if dismissable}}×{{/if}}
{{#if message}} {{{message}}} {{else}} {{{this}}} {{/if}}
components/wishlist/wishlist-modal:
{{#if customer.wishlists}} {{lang 'product.wishlist.choose_wishlist'}} {{else}} {{lang 'core.account.wishlists.create'}} {{/if}}

{{#if customer.wishlists}} {{> components/wishlist/wishlist-list}} {{/if}} {{> components/wishlist/wishlist-create}}
core/products/event: {{product.event_date.name}} {{lang 'common.required'}} {{#if product.event_date.date_start}} {{#if product.event_date.date_end}} {{lang 'forms.date.bounds' start_date=product.event_date.date_start end_date=product.event_date.date_end}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
components/reviews/review-modal:
{{lang 'product.reviews.write_review'}}

{{#if product.reviews.throttleToken}} {{/if}} {{#if product.reviews.throttleToken}} {{/if}} {{!-- Clickable Stars --}}
{{lang 'product.reviews.rating_label'}}
{{!-- Name --}} {{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'product.reviews.form.name') name="revfromname" id="revfromname" required="true" prefill=(lang 'product.reviews.form.name') }} {{!-- Email --}} {{> core/forms/common/email label=(lang 'product.reviews.form.email') name="email" id="rating-email" required="true" prefill=(lang 'product.reviews.form.email') }} {{!-- Subject --}} {{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'product.reviews.form.subject') name="revtitle" id="rating-title" required="true" prefill=(lang 'product.reviews.form.subject') }} {{!-- Comments --}} {{> core/forms/common/multiline label=(lang 'product.reviews.form.comments') name="revtext" id="rating-comment" required="true" rows=6 prefill=(lang 'product.reviews.form.comments') }} {{!-- Recaptcha V2 --}} {{{product.reviews.recaptcha.markup}}}
core/forms/customizations/checkbox: {{display_name}} {{#if required}}{{lang 'common.required'}}{{/if}}
core/forms/customizations/file: {{#if file_types '!==' ''}} {{lang 'core.account.products.filetypes' file_types=file_types}} {{/if}} {{lang 'core.account.products.max_filesize' bytes=file_size}}
core/forms/options/date: {{display_name}} {{#if required}} {{lang 'common.required'}} {{/if}}
core/forms/options/input-checkbox: {{display_name}} {{#if required}} {{lang 'common.required'}} {{/if}}
core/forms/options/input-file: {{#if file_types '!==' ''}} {{lang 'core.account.products.filetypes' file_types=file_types}} {{/if}} {{lang 'core.account.products.max_filesize' bytes=file_size}}
core/forms/options/product-list:
{{display_name}} {{#if required}} {{lang 'common.required'}} {{/if}}
{{#unless values.0.image}} {{!-- same as radio buttons if no image set --}} {{#each values}} {{/each}} {{#unless required}} {{/unless}} {{else}} {{#each values}} {{/each}} {{#unless required}} {{/unless}} {{/unless}}
core/forms/options/set-radio:
{{display_name}} {{#if required}} {{lang 'common.required'}} {{/if}}
{{#each values}} {{/each}} {{#unless required}} {{/unless}}
core/forms/options/set-rectangle:
{{display_name}} {{#if required}} {{lang 'common.required'}} {{/if}}
{{#each values}} {{/each}} {{#unless required}} {{/unless}}
core/forms/options/swatch:
{{display_name}} {{lang 'forms.swatches_none_selected'}} {{#if required}} {{lang 'common.required'}} {{/if}}
{{#each values}} {{/each}} {{#unless required}} {{/unless}}
components/wishlist/wishlist-list: {{#each customer.wishlists}} {{/each}}
components/wishlist/wishlist-create: {{> core/forms/common/text required=true name="wishlistname" id="wishlistname" value=forms.wishlist.name prefill="New Wishlist" }}
